DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety of R89674 0.25% ophthalmic solution in healthy normal volunteers
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study of Ophthalmic Solution in Healthy, Normal Volunteers
DOC.criteria: healthy normal volunteers age >=3 years with normal ocular health and a bestcorrected logMAR score of 0.3 or better intraocular surgery and/or ocular surgical intervention within last 3 months, refractive surgery within last 6 months, active ocular disorder other than refractive disorders, breastfeeding women, pregnant female < 18 years of age
DOC.keyword: Healthy volunteers, safety, ocular, allergic conjunctivitis, ophthalmic
